segments.text: Professor wang can I ask a few questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a tax levy by the goveroverment on goods imported into that country .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why does the government levy the tariff ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tariff provides the government with extra tax revenue .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tariff raises the price at which the goods are sold in the importing country and therefore makes them less competitive with locally produced goods .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I know . Thank you . Professor wang .
segments.speaker: S1
